text: @PressSec His dream died in Tulsa when this nightmare of a president held a rally with no masks and no social distancing. Cain contracted COVID-19 and died because your boss wanted to have a party. He killed Cain and you lie everyday for him. You’re an accomplish to his murderist acts.
